title: Collaborative Learning Program for Animal Behavior and Welfare Attitude Formation

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Exploration of practical strategies for in-service elementary teachers to integrate animal welfare issues into educational settings.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze educational field cases by applying the Five Freedoms animal welfare standards
Learners can collaboratively develop animal behavior observation protocols with peer teachers
Learners can design animal welfare education activity plans reflecting societal discussions

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
